Episodes.Title: It's a Kind of Magic
Episodes.Plot: Daisy, Blane and Rose have caught the Grand Master but the USA President is suddenly kidnapped.

Episodes.Title: You Can Call Me Al
Episodes.Plot: A hapless inventor brings trouble to St Hope's when his Artificial Intelligence computer tries to enforce the school rules.

Episodes.Title: Evil by Design
Episodes.Plot: A new fashion range is imprinting logos into kids, with weird side effects.

Episodes.Title: Fit Up
Episodes.Plot: When a strange sleeping sickness hits Britain's kids, the team investigate but when Daisy is tricked and falls into a deep sleep the spies are put under pressure.

Episodes.Title: Face Off
Episodes.Plot: A crimewave is committed by allegedly well-behaved kids, and the team are baffled when Lenny is arrested.

Episodes.Title: Big Sister
Episodes.Plot: The spies investigate when a child-hating MP threatens to send Britain's kids to a remote island.

Episodes.Title: The Cold War
Episodes.Plot: The Grandmaster unleashes his own cold war on Britain, a nasty flu epidemic.

Episodes.Title: Nano Nits
Episodes.Plot: Daisy must overcome her greatest fear when the kids of St Hope's catch nits and become master criminals.

Episodes.Title: The Others
Episodes.Plot: The spies are stunned when they are forced to team up with old foes Violet Webb, Lewis Chuckworth and the Worm to battle ex-agent James Blond.

Episodes.Title: The Big Bling
Episodes.Plot: When the most famous diamonds in the world are stolen, the team investigate the captain of the England football team for crimes against bling.

Episodes.Title: Spy Plane
Episodes.Plot: Will Blane be able to keep his feet on the ground when a mysterious pilot steals the X20? Could Blane have revealed MI High's secrets to Stewart? Daisy goes undercover to investigate.

Episodes.Title: Green Finger
Episodes.Plot: When crazed plants attack anti-green targets, Blane goes solo, but it's unclear whether his boy power is enough to weed out the enemy.

Episodes.Title: Asteroid Attack
Episodes.Plot: When an asteroid hurtles towards the Earth the government abandons its post, leaving the fate of the world in the spies' hands. But will Daisy abandon Blane and Rose?
